Performance:
December 1977: The Trouble in the Date Household

Production: December 1977

Play: The Trouble in the Date Household (伽羅先代萩)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:

The Bamboo Room (竹の間 / Takenoma)

The State Room (御殿 / Goten)

Masaoka's Loyalty (政岡忠義 / Masaoka chūgi)

Under the Floor (床下 / Yukashita)

Characters:

Masaoka (Menoto Masaoka / 乳人政岡)

Tsurukiyo (Tsurukiyo Gimi / 鶴喜代君)

Senmatsu (Senmatsu / 千松)

Yashio (Yashio / 八汐)

Okinoi (Okinoi / 沖の井)

Komaki (Komaki / 小巻)

Secret agent (Shinobi / 忍び)

Lady Sakae (Sakae Gozen / 栄御前)

Setsunosuke Matsugae (Matsugae Setsunosuke / 松ヶ枝節之助)

Kageyu Kaita (Kaida) (Kaita Kageyu / 貝田勘解由)

Kasane (Kasane / 累)

Yoemon, in fact Tanizo Kinugawa (Yoemon jitsuwa Kinugawa Tanizō / 与右衛門 実は 絹川谷蔵)

Yonokichi (Hyakushō Yonokichi / 百姓与之吉)

Okoma (Okoma / お駒)

Brothel owner (Hanaōgiya teishu / 花扇屋亭主)

Kingoro (Kingorō / 金五郎)

Utakata (Utakata Hime / 歌潟姫)

Sabu (Tōfuya Sabu / 豆腐屋三婦)
